timeline.message:
Reload action chain editor, when dealing with maintenance windows

We want to display either date picker/maintenance windows picker/warning
based on the systems and scheduled actions. When the systems change
(user clicks delete system or delete action), we want to reload the
page, so that the picker gets refreshed.

Reload action chain editor, when dealing with maintenance windows

We want to display either date picker/maintenance windows picker/warning
based on the systems and scheduled actions. When the systems change
(user clicks delete system or delete action), we want to reload the
page, so that the picker gets refreshed.

Prevent scheduling actions when there are empty maintenance windows

In this case, display a warning to the user and hide the scheduling UI.

The maintenance-window-picker.jsp could be simplified: it's displayed,
only if the maintenance windows are non-empty (therefore the check in it
was unneeded).
